components.name: DynamicFormComponent

propertiesClass.name: newFormGroup

methodsClass.name: addNewItemToFormArrayWithId
methodsClass.rawdescription:
ADD NEW ITEM TO FORM ARRAY WITH ID:
Duplicates the whole section or a form item within a section
methodsClass.description: ADD NEW ITEM TO FORM ARRAY WITH ID: Duplicates the whole section or a form item within a section

jsdoctags.comment: the id of the form item which should be duplicated
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

methodsClass.name: hasConfirmation
methodsClass.rawdescription: Find if the current selected values have a confirmation required
methodsClass.description: Find if the current selected values have a confirmation required

methodsClass.name: removeItemAtIndexFromFormArrayWithId
methodsClass.rawdescription:
REMOVE ITEM AT INDEX FROM FORM ARRAY WITH ID:
Removes the whole section or a form item within a section
methodsClass.description: REMOVE ITEM AT INDEX FROM FORM ARRAY WITH ID: Removes the whole section or a form item within a section

jsdoctags.comment: the id of the form item which should be removed and the index of where to remove it
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

methodsClass.name: shouldRenderControl
methodsClass.rawdescription:
SHOULD RENDER CONTROL:
Determines if the form control should be rendered or not.
methodsClass.description: SHOULD RENDER CONTROL: Determines if the form control should be rendered or not.

jsdoctags.comment: the target form item that should or should not be displayed
if the formgroup is an array this is the index of the formgroup item

methodsClass.name: calculateHeight
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Calculate image height based on the current width, the origin width and the origin height
height = currentWidth * naturalHeight / naturalWidth
methodsClass.description: Calculate image height based on the current width, the origin width and the origin height height = currentWidth * naturalHeight / naturalWidth
